title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: When searching for references to a field in an external jar, the search results are not being selected. This issue is occurring in Build 200201151.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, observe that the first match is not selected.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the application. 2. Search for references to a field in an external jar. 3. Double-click on one of the search results. Expected behavior: The selected search result should be highlighted or otherwise visually indicated.
